title: Compromised Account
body:
First things first this is a smurf account of mine.

My original account has been compromised at some point and I can't log in to appeal to anything on the forums. 

Basically it's been about 2 months since I've played league of legends, due to working full time and a busy lifestyle ( 60+hr weeks ) 

During this time I had never checked up on my account because generally you assume your account is fine and there's no need to.

Anyway about two days ago I received an email saying my account has been banned, I messaged support to explain my situation and got a text book reply about terms of service, after that I basically got a reply saying "tough shit" the words were never said but the message was clear. This account is from season 2 and I've spent countless on it, it's my baby!

I can't recover it cause they won't help and on top of that its been banned, I'm reaching out here for some kind of additional support

replies.body:
While the actions on your account may not have been intentional by you, these scripting applications were used on the account and as such, the account has been suspended for that reason. Riot holds accounts and their owners responsible for any actions that are done on that account, which is why it's imperative to maintain your account security. With that being said, you could go to [**Player Behavior & Moderation (NA)**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) and appeal to any Rioters; however, the suspension is justified and the current policy is to not reverse these types of suspensions. 

All the best,
Wuks
Thanks for you reply and help, I'll make my way over there and see if someone can help me, there's nothing worse than having information stolen
